title: Casablanca
hint: In a smoky café far from home, love and sacrifice meet under foreign skies.

title: Citizen Kane
hint: A man’s final word sparks a search through the shadows of wealth and memory.

title: The Godfather
hint: Power, loyalty, and family ties weave a deadly offer that cannot be refused.

title: 12 Angry Men
hint: A single voice dares to sway eleven others in a room thick with judgment.

title: City Lights
hint: A small tramp finds love in a big city, despite life’s comic stumbles.

title: Rear Window
hint: From one room, a lens reveals secrets across the courtyard—some better left unseen.

title: Metropolis
hint: Above and below, a city’s heart beats as machines and people clash in steel shadows.

title: Psycho
hint: A quiet roadside inn hides a chilling secret behind its thin, dripping walls.

title: It's a Wonderful Life
hint: A man sees his world anew when shown the lives he’s quietly shaped.

title: Seven Samurai
hint: Seven warriors unite to shield a humble village from the gathering storm.

title: The Wizard of Oz
hint: A whirlwind adventure brings friends together on a road paved with golden dreams.

title: Singin' in the Rain
hint: Under stormy skies, joy and music light up a changing world of film.

title: Vertigo
hint: A dizzying chase for truth spins into love, obsession, and illusion.

title: The Godfather: Part II
hint: Past and present intertwine as a family’s power deepens across oceans and time.

title: The Third Man
hint: In postwar shadows, an old friend’s return hides more than it reveals.

title: Modern Times
hint: A small man battles the big machine in a world turning too fast.

title: The Apartment
hint: In the city’s tall towers, love blooms between missed chances and closed doors.

title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
hint: Madness in the war room dances on the brink of global ruin.

title: Double Indemnity
hint: Greed and desire drive a plot where love signs its own death warrant.

title: Lawrence of Arabia
hint: A lone man crosses vast sands, uniting tribes beneath a blazing sun.

title: Battleship Potemkin
hint: A crew’s rebellion shakes a nation as tragedy strikes upon the steps.

title: Sunset Boulevard
hint: A faded star clings to the spotlight, weaving a deadly Hollywood dream.

title: All About Eve
hint: Ambition takes the stage as admiration twists into rivalry under the lights.

title: M
hint: A city hunts a shadowy figure preying on its most innocent souls.
